page.title: 07A HOUSE IN THE HIGH STREET
page.content: {Mr.Faben} took us into his daughter's house in the{High Street.} The first thing he showed was an{old {well}in the{courtyard}which was carved out of solid{sandstone}with no lining. He then showed us the old{Smithy}where the{forge and anvil}used to be.There was also an old safe with a lion and unicorn coat of arms. Around the courtyard were old{ {washouses}with stone sinks and coppers for boiling water.There was an old{ {earth-closet}which is no longer used.Did the sewage pollute the drinking water in the past? In the house were steps down to two old{cellars}which stretched underneath the High Street with its heavy traffic.They were carved out of the sandstone.The house used to belong to the{Earl Manvers}at{Thoresby}who gave it to a servant as a present.
